courses.name: Pre-Design Stage of PV
courses.desc: “Pre-Design Stage of PV” Solar Energy Training program covers all Fundamentals & Manufacturing process of PV needed to qualify the trainee for the design phase

courses.name: Advanced PV Systems Design
courses.desc: “Advanced PV Systems Design” Solar Energy Training program covers all necessary knowledge and techniques needed to qualify the trainee to design on grid, off grid, pumping, earthing and lightning protection systems

courses.name: Embedded Systems
courses.desc: Wanna be a part of the next hardware trend movement , Embedded Systems Training is your right choice ..

courses.name: Arduino
courses.desc: For Makers and Students , Your Hardware project have never been easier to be alive …

courses.name: Virtual Reality (VR)
courses.desc: VR stands for 'Virtual Reality' where is a non realistic world makes you feel immersed in your surroundings.

courses.name: Graphic Design
courses.desc: As a Graphic designer you need some magic tools to be capable of presenting visual communications aimed at conveying specific important messages.

courses.name: AR workshop
courses.desc: AR stands for 'Augmented Reality' where is is the real world is enhanced by computer-generated perceptual information so lets take the advantage of creating your own workshop project.

courses.name: Game Development Workshop
courses.desc: Using the art of game development you can take the advantage of creating your workshop game.

courses.name: Game Development Diploma
courses.desc: Game Development is an art that makes you capable of creating games and describes the design, development and release of a game

courses.name: Flutter
courses.desc: with 'Flutter', a fabulous software development kit and one of the most powerful open-source UI kits created by Google . you can develop cross platform applications for Android, iOS, Linux, macOS, Windows, Google Fuchsia and the web from a single codebase.

courses.name: Web Development
courses.desc: Developing a website for the Internet or an intranet, developing a simple page of plain text to complex web applications, electronic businesses, and social network services, welcome to the web development Track.

courses.name: Distribution Training (by SMC & Eduvate)
courses.desc: The program reconciles university electrical basis to suits the market frame, builds-up a firm ground in the electrical design field, and provides an inclusive overview to the market different paths, types and projects' parties.

courses.name: Panel builders
courses.desc: The course laids groundbreaking for MV & LV Switchgears' market in both design and manufacturing perspectives.

courses.name: HVAC
courses.desc: The program qualifies you to understand the tasks of HVAC engineers included in basics of HVAC,  VRF air conditioning system, and refrigeration. All the duties of technical office engineer : HVAC Design, system selection; shop drawings,  technical submittal and finally technical offer

courses.name: FireFighting
courses.desc: The program qualifies you to understand the tasks of Firefighting engineers included in all Firefighting systems. All the duties of technical office engineer : pump calculations, system selection; shop drawings,  technical submittal and finally technical offer

courses.name: Plumbing
courses.desc: The program qualifies you to understand the tasks of plumbing engineers included in water supply,  water drain, Swimming pools and fountains.All the duties of technical office engineer : pump calculations, system selection; shop drawings,  technical submittal and finally technical offer

courses.name: BIM
courses.desc: BIM is the overall process of creating a three-dimensional database in the form of a model of information. Revit is just one of many software applications under the BIM umbrella that lead to an efficient design of space.

courses.name: Technical Office Track
courses.desc: Training that qualifies you to understand the tasks of the technical office included in the organizational structure of the project, bids, tenders, measurements, construction contracts, inventory of quantities, pricing, extracts, correspondence, reports, project documents, and practical application to all tasks of the technical office

courses.name: Structural Design Track
courses.desc: Training that qualifies you to design all structural elements using engineering programs

courses.name: AutoCAD Track
courses.desc: Training that qualifies you to use the most famous engineering program (AutoCAD) professionally and to understand and apply all commands

courses.name: Finishing Track
courses.desc: Training that qualifies you to understand all the finishing elements and receive all items from the contractor, a real qualification for the field of work

courses.name: LUMION
courses.desc: Residential design, interior architecture, landscape, urban and more, all with Lumion, the 3D rendering software made especially for architects.
